result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order - Injunction

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jovan Rashad Bentley

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jovan Rashad Bentley not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Claire E Zyber in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status of counsel hearing.  No attorney has been appointed yet.  Court ordered case adjourned to 11-8-22 at 1:30 pm Order to Show Cause hearing as to why an attorney has not been appointed yet.  Parties notified of  court date via email.
Order to show cause hearing scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jovan Rashad Bentley not in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Holland Reed in court for Jovan Rashad Bentley.  Prosecuting attorney Michelle A. Grasso in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a State V. Lee Hearing.  Attorney Tom Reed is appearing for today's hearing only.  Attorney Reed states on the record the reasons why an attorney has not been appointed yet. Court finds good cause to toll time limits.  Case is adjourned to 10-13-22 at 8:30 am for status of counsel.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report, filed.

Defendant Jovan Rashad Bentley not in court, in custody in HOC.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Status Conference. SPD has not appointed counsel. Case is adjourned. Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE to the trial court for a State V. Lee Hearing.
Hearing scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jovan Rashad Bentley not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Status Conference. SPD has not appointed counsel. Case is adjourned. Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status of Counsel.
Status conference scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

CASE HEARD IN PRELIM FOR BR. 10
Defendant Jovan Rashad Bentley not in court, in custody. Abby Rockendorf in court, appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status of counsel in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Status conference scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Court ordered no contact with JAB (DOB: 04/20/1984)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Jovan Rashad Bentley in court with attorney Nicholas John Conrardy.  Defendant Jovan Rashad Bentley in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jovan Rashad Bentley appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 3 and 4.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
